description: This PHP source file defines the VenueRepository class, which implements the VenueService interface. It provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting Venue objects, including validation, database interactions, and some commented-out code for handling file uploads to S3. The class also includes a private method to generate seat map identifiers based on venue names.

classes.name: VenueRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing Venue entities, including creation, retrieval, update, deletion, and seat map ID generation.

methods.name: createVenue
methods.description: Creates a new Venue with validation and optional seat map upload handling.

methods.name: getAllVenues
methods.description: Retrieves all Venue records and serializes them into an array.

methods.name: getVenue
methods.description: Retrieves a specific Venue by ID.

methods.name: removeVenue
methods.description: Deletes a Venue if no related events exist.

methods.name: updateVenue
methods.description: Updates Venue details and regenerates seat map ID.

methods.name: generateSeatMapId
methods.description: Generates an acronym for the seat map based on the venue's name.
